name: Sugarflash
description:
The Game: Sugarflash

This is a little Platformer with three Levels.

You play as a bunny who is Sugarsick, but the World is out of Sugar!!

So you have only one minute before you die AND your Speed and Jump Height grows over Time!

The Controlls

Move: Arrow Keys/ WASD

Jump: Space

The Making

This Game was made in 48h in the Kenney Jam.  All Assets, Fonts and Sounds belong to Kenney

Thanks for playing
